Two users reused a prime to generate their RSA keys. An intercepted message: 2881494013561365478302211478670606800855098684203392551543925402871416544763164087616212766799474611723369237966156913153165581932576095860901696847385894. Can you recover the secret?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=7655078672076117241349236815371031154833390275495159243570516016571951599128346247869249071230180923928298383346082695200390321824534340777213179304241843, n2=7671784788035942790138200602348494811634885858816516974357591225972801206914382713060463845391648122667426517613384276946071770218020637228147538802589779, e=648647106130623523811691484234378576936584240506229189310472311801880193450100521253577893218053636108410098223201228764726594982929131090114416535607919

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{3m1oouxl}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 2881494013561365478302211478670606800855098684203392551543925402871416544763164087616212766799474611723369237966156913153165581932576095860901696847385894
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=7655078672076117241349236815371031154833390275495159243570516016571951599128346247869249071230180923928298383346082695200390321824534340777213179304241843, n2=7671784788035942790138200602348494811634885858816516974357591225972801206914382713060463845391648122667426517613384276946071770218020637228147538802589779, e=648647106130623523811691484234378576936584240506229189310472311801880193450100521253577893218053636108410098223201228764726594982929131090114416535607919
extra_info: p=108635503019722021237932422479927109333550446935421063147739960222349146843857, q=70465717553555128871745317548730538302170240322606807731461812466525333100099, q2=70619498918720738400327970630668518744793615546507858547674751977940647000547, φ(n)=7655078672076117241349236815371031154833390275495159243570516016571951599128167146648675794080071246188269725698446974513132293953655139004524304824297888, φ(n2)=7671784788035942790138200602348494811634885858816516974357591225972801206914203458058525402632009862274315921985305932883589841296325222515947249008745376
